comments_since_last_sample.body: I’ve only started watching iskall recently and he is so wholesome
I would put statues of you and Etho on the outside for your entrance, with the outside arms lifted so that you both look like you are beckoning each other into the entrance

iskall I think it would look good to add some cave pockets on the sides! i know you just patched up the caves but adding little pockets of cave on the sides with details (maybe represent a room) would be great!
There is also the rooted dirt to add to your gradient if you felt like it, Iskall :) You can dig it up from under the base of the Azalea trees you grew :)
when he said that the terrain looks like his mom, It made me think he could actually turn it into a massive statue with small tweaks to make it look enchanted.

I think it’s too plain to look enchanted, you could add many many bushes and trees along with spore blossoms to make it look overgrown along with a few patches of water puddles with dripleaf growing in it and to break the plain-ness of the stone walls maybe glow lichen and glow berries could work
